subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Nigel de Jong was cut from the Netherlands roster by Coach Bert van Marwijk after de Jong, a Manchester City midfielder, broke an opponent’s leg with a tackle for the second time in seven months.
snippet: Nigel de Jong was cut from the Netherlands roster by Coach Bert van Marwijk after de Jong, a Manchester City midfielder, broke an opponent’s leg with a tackle for the second time in seven months.
